question.saved: Atomic Question with RDC-ID {{ id }} was saved successfully!
question.not-saved: Atomic Question with RDC-ID {{ id }} has not been saved!
question.missing-id: Atomic Question {{ index }} does not contain a RDC-ID and has not been saved!
question.upload-terminated: Finished upload of {{ total }} Questions with {{ errors }} errors.

question.valid-atomic-question-id-name: The RDC-ID must start with the project ID (e.g. projectID-variableName) and must be equal to variable ID!
question.unique-question-name: The name of an atomic question has to be unique within a questionnaire.

id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.
id.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts, ÃŸ, space, underscore and minus for the RDC-ID.

type.not-null: The type of the atomic question must not be empty.
type.question-type-consistence: The type of the atomic question has an invalid value or is inconsistent between the languages.

name.not-empty: The name of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
name.size: The max length of the name is 32 signs.

composite-question-name.not-empty: The composite question name of an Atomic Question must not be empty!
composite-question-name.size: The max length of the composite question name is 32 signs

footnote.i18n-string-size: The max length of the footnote is 2048 signs.

question-text.i18n-string-size: The max length of the question text is 2048 signs.

instruction.i18n-string-size: The max length of the instruction is 2048 signs.

introduction.i18n-string-size: The max length of the introduction is 2048 signs.

section-header.i18n-string-size: The max length of the section header is 128 signs.

id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of the Data Acquisition Project must not be empty!
The RDC-ID of the Questionnaire must not be empty!
The RDC-ID of the Variable must not be empty!

post-validation.atomicQuestionHasInvalidVariableId: The Atomic Question {{id}} references an unknown Variable ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
post-validation.atomicQuestionHasInvalidQuestionnaireId: The Atomic Question {{id}} references an unknown Questionnaire ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
